title: WTB: Sweet Caporal 350 factory 25 Chicago Nationals
author: Rascal1010

posts.post_title: WTB: Sweet Caporal 350 factory 25 Chicago Nationals
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy the following list of Chicago Nationals with Sweet Caporal 350 factory 25 backs.  Not really picky on the condition, just no paper loss.  They can be graded or raw doesn't matter to me.

You can email scans and your price to [url]Asmusstephen@gmail.com[/url]


Mordecai Brown (Portrait)
Johnny Evers (Portrait)
Solly Hofman
Johnny Kling
Rube Kroh
Jake Pfeister (Throwing)
Ed Reulbach (No Glove)
Jimmy Sheckard (No Glove)
Harry Steinfeldt (Portrait)
Joe Tinker (Bat off Shoulder)
Joe Tinker (Portrait)

Thanks,
Steve
I don't have any extras available but they all come along on ebay pretty often except the Kroh which I'd say grab when you get the chance.
I just bought a Solly Hoffman from BBT206 here last week.  Sorry:o
